title: Matchsafe, "Long Jumper", 1928
markings: Illegible marks, and 800 stamped on reverse.
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, curved sides, featuring raised decoration of long jump runner in mid-air over track, "Lotte" inscribed on upper left corner, reverse inscribed in raised letters "Olympische Spelen 1928," thumb catch at top center pulls brass match container insert out of decorated silver sleeve. Striker on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Long Jumper", 1928.
1928. Silver, brass. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-62.
